## fromInterval variable

Returns a [Stream](./rstream.stream.md) of monotonically increasing counter values, emitted at given `delay` interval and up to the optionally defined max value (default: âˆž), after which the stream is closed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromInterval: (delay: number, opts?: Partial<FromIntervalOpts> | undefined) => Stream<number>
```

## Remarks

The stream only starts when the first subscriber becomes available.
